titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain sorbic acid (hexadienic acid) (2,4-hexadienoic acid).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/5/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2008, the duty on certain sorbic acid (hexadienic acid) (2,4-hexadienoic acid).
